"""
    Test of the fiscla.get_D_ss() function.
    """
r_gov = 0.03
Y = 1.176255339
p = Specifications()
p.debt_ratio_ss = 1.2
p.budget_balance = budget_balance
p.g_n_ss = 0.02
test_tuple = fiscal.get_D_ss(r_gov, Y, p)
for i, v in enumerate(test_tuple):
    assert np.allclose(v, expected_tuple[i])
pytest.mark.parametrize('budget_balance,expected_tuple', [(False,
    expected_tuple1), (True, expected_tuple2)], ids=[
    'balanced_budget = False', 'balanced_budget = True'])
